Norman's attempt at setting the Holly story straight is a well-researched volume in which Holly comes across as a talented, fun-loving guy who carried the torch for a high-school sweetheart with strong religious convictions; who blindly signed over much of his future income to Norman Perry, his {qword}smarmy{/qword} producer and manager; and who endured grueling concert tours of the U.S. and Britain.
